RMIClient - Class in org.example.client
The RMIClient class is responsible for managing the client's connection to the server using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).

RMIClientCallbackImpl - Class in org.example.client
The RMIClientCallbackImpl class implements the RMIClientCallbackInterface and handles the communication between the RMI server and the RMI client.

Constructor for RMIClientCallbackImpl.
RMIClientCallbackInterface - Interface in org.example.server.rmi
The RMIClientCallbackInterface is an RMI (Remote Method Invocation) interface that defines the methods the server can call on the client.

Classe RMIServer che gestisce l'inizializzazione e la gestione del server RMI.

RMIServerInterface - Interface in org.example.server.rmi
The RMIServerInterface defines the methods that the RMI server will expose to clients.
